text: mattu nivu patniyarige talak nidiruvaga, avaru tam'ma avadhiyannu purtigolisida balika, niyamanusara, paraspara oppigeyondige tam'ma (aykeya) bere patiyarannu vivahavaguvudakke nivu tadeyoddabedi. Nim'ma paiki, allahanalli mattu antima dinadalli nambike ullavarigagi idannu bodhisalaguttide. Idu nim'ma palige heccu sud'dha hagu nirmala dhoraneyagide. Allahanu ballanu adare, nivu aritilla
